description: Good luck finding a safe VPN
extended: If you're most people, you just found out about the FCC's internet privacy rules by way of their untimely demise. Thanks to the FCC's new chief, Congress, and Donald Trump, ISPs are now free to track you like crazy and sell your data to the four directions.

description: Packet Sniffing in the Subway – Jen Kagan – Medium
extended: While I was waiting on the Fulton C subway platform one afternoon, I was surprised to get a text. Underground. Surrounded by metal and concrete — materials through which texts do not usually travel.
